title: [Library Aies, Alcove]
description: Alongside the building, a round alcove of paving stones is bordered by manicured beds of pansies in hues of silvered blue.  Their color is matched in the metallic surface of a small plaque and attendant door, which are set into the library's wall amidst an arched mosaic of glaesine tiles.

longside the building, a round alcove of paving stones is lit by shuttered lanterns and bordered by manicured beds of pansies in hues of silvered blue.  Their color is matched in the metallic surface of a small plaque and attendant door, which are set into the library's wall amidst an arched mosaic of glaesine tiles.
